metadata.synopsis: Kill any of Tusgront's guards either in his view or outside of his view - Mainly here to either show players why they're under attack, or call attention to the fact that they'll attack on sight.

0.speaker: Tusgront
0.text: Huh. Someone playing games. They're going to lose.
0.context: NodeContext: Guarded, looking around for player who is hidden

1.speaker: Tusgront
1.text: Should've stayed hidden down in the muck, worm!
